Transition.synopsis: This scene plays for people in the Druid Grove if another player kills the Goblin Leaders away from the Grove.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The provided session 'Transition' does not have any other sessions to compare it against for ordering or exclusivity. As it is the only session in the input, there are no predecessors or successors to establish an order with. Additionally, since there are no other sessions listed, there are no mutual exclusivity rules to define.

Transition_0.speaker: Gerson the Bent
Transition_0.text: Have you heard? Scouts have just reported the goblins have been neutralised. The way is clear!

Transition_1.speaker: Gerson the Bent
Transition_1.text: The others are gathering near the gate - come on!
